sessionTitle:
Observability for Serverless
无服务器架构的可观测性
sessionSummary: 亚马逊云科技 provides comprehensive observability for serverless through logs in CloudWatch Logs, metrics and insights in CloudWatch, and distributed tracing with X-Ray. Additionally, Amazon Distro for OpenTelemetry (ADOT) enables standardized telemetry data collection, while Amazon Lambda Power Tools simplifies logging, metrics, and tracing for Lambda functions.
title: 亚马逊云科技 Senior Solutions Architect

sessionTitle:
Zero ETL on 亚马逊云科技 - Accelerating Insights, Eliminating Complexity 
加速洞察，消除复杂度
sessionSummary: ZeroETL represents a paradigm shift in data processing, eradicating the traditional Extract, Transform, Load(ETL) complexities. Join us to explore how ZeroETL on 亚马逊云科技 streamlines data pipelines, reduces latency, and accelerates insights generation.
title: 亚马逊云科技 Hero/D&A Practice Lead
